title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displaying in different formats in a dynamic text item compared to a data or text item.
OB: The dynamic text item displays the datetime value in a different format than the data and text items.
EB: The expected behavior is that all three items should display the datetime value in the same format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item.
2. Set the content for all three items as 'new Date()'.
3. Save and preview the page.
4. Observe the displayed datetime formats in each item.
